text: tene jyare temani a dagani vato sambhali, to te'one bolavya ane temana mate eka sabha rakhi ane temana manthi darekane cappu apyum ane kahyum he yusupha! A loko same avo, te stri'o'e jyare temane joya to ghana ja sundara joya ane potana hatha kapi nakhya ane jhabana manthi nikali gayum, “hasa-allaha” a to manavi che ja nahim, a to kharekhara ko'i pratisthita pharisto che
